sources.title: Beyond Atlantis (1973) SID HAIG â˜… LEIGH CHRISTIAN
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Sid Haig, Patrick Wayne, John Ashley, Leigh Christian
Director: Eddie Romero
Underwater Photography: Michael J. Dugan

A band of adventurers searching for a treasure in legendary pearls, discover an uncharted island with a civilization that may be descendants from the lost continent of Atlantis!

TRIVIA: Sid Haig was offered the role of Marsellus Wallace (later played by Ving Rhames) in Pulp Fiction. Seeing the shooting script and the short number of days dedicated to each locale, he passed on the project. Haig later appeared as a judge in the 1997 film Jackie Brown, a part written specifically for him by Quentin Tarantino.

metadata.Plot: A band of adventurers invade a native island determined to grab a reported fortune in buried treasure. The islanders are just as determined to keep their sacred treasure. Complications ensue.
metadata.Actors: Patrick Wayne, John Ashley, Leigh Christian
